seller.shipping:
CONVENIENT PAYMENT:   

For your convenience, we accept payment in ANY currency (USD, EUR, CHF, GBP, and many others).

We are happy to accept any of these payment methods:  

Credit Cards
ApplePay
Paypal
IBAN / SEPA Bank Transfer (in CHF)  *(for transfers in EUR, JPY, USD, read more below)
Przelewy24
SoFort
IDeal
Bancontact
KBC/CBS Payment Button
Belfius Direct Net
Money Orders
Cash

*If you'd like to make a payment via Bank Transfer, please ensure the payment is done in CHF (Swiss Francs) (or please request further information before initiating the bank transfer. :)  

We can also accept bank transfer in USD, EUR, or JPY, but in that case- the account number is *different*   Please contact us, tell us which of these currencies (JPY, EUR, USD) you want to make a bank transfer in, and then we will send you the account number for that currency.


__________________________________________________________________________



SHIPPING:


We try to keep shipping costs relatively simple (and affordable).  To get our shipping rates, simply take a look below the price of the item in our store.  If you are logged into your Discogs account, and have a shipping address saved, you will see the shipping cost displayed. 

We offer three services (via Japan Post):  

Air Mail (generally takes around 2-3 weeks to reach most parts of the world, tracking/insurance is not available).
Registered Air Mail (2-3 weeks on average, comes with online tracking, and insurance). 
EMS (Japan's elite shipping ninjas deliver these quite swiftly (sometimes in just a few days to most countries ). However, ultimately delivery time always depends on how efficient customs clearance and the domestic postal service in your country operates, once EMS Japan hands the package over to them.  There are times (albeit rare) where even EMS can take several weeks to arrive.  


PLEASE NOTE:  Our shipping department will be closed for the Christmas Holidays and the first week of the New Year.  Our shipping will resume on January 8, although - please note, that due to the backup in orders amassed during this period, we may not be able to immediately provide tracking or shipping on our first day back.  Please bare with us, and allow us some leniency during this holiday season.  

Our customer service team will be available to assist you on a daily basis throughout the holidays, nevertheless.  Any questions about items will be answered in their usual prompt manner.  Details about shipping or shipment status however, may not be available until after the Christmas/New Year's holiday.  

Thank you for your understanding - and we wish all of our friends here a most wonderful and safe Holiday Season and New Year celebrations!

-Mayumi, Haruka, PJ, and the rest of the Kupiku.com team


CDs:

*ITALIAN CUSTOMERS:  Due to the poor performance of Italian Post, we now only offer EMS service to Italy.  We apologize for this, but - even on Japan Post website, there is a warning about Italian Post and the risk of sending to Italy.  Too many packages are lost, delayed for many months, held by Italian Customs for long periods of time, or face other problems when sending to Italy.  For this reason, we now will only offer EMS service to Italy (21.75 CHF for one CD/DVD, or 29.75 for one vinyl record).  However, to help with this cost, we will offer FREE shipping to Italian customers, for any extra item in the same order:  so, no matter if you buy 1 CD, or 10 CDs, your shipping cost is still just 21.75 CHF, for quick, registered, insured EMS service).  Please also note, by law, we must include the correct invoice inside the package:  we cannot declare an incorrect value on the package for you).  


WORLDWIDE SHIPPING: 

Zone 1: 

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, Spain, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Monaco, San Marino, Vatican City State, Andorra, Spain (Canary Islands), United Kingdom, Denmark, Estonia, Finland,Ireland,Latvia,Latvia, Lithuania, Sweden,  Australia, New Zealand, United States, Canada, Singapore, Hong Kong, South Korea, Taiwan

Air Mail/Economy mail: CHF 6.00 + CHF 1.00 for each addition item (up to a maximum order value of 75 CHF)
Registered mail CHF 14.25 + CHF 2.00 for each addition item 
EMS CHF 21.75 + CHF 3.00 for each addition item 

Vinyl, Laserdisc:
Air Mail : CHF 14.10
Registered mail at CHF 24.25 
EMS service at CHF 33.75 

Zone 2:

France, Romania, Cyprus, Russian Federation, France (European Territory), Albania, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Gibraltar, Macedonia, Serbia, Montenegro, Belarus, Moldavia, Ukraine

Registered mail CHF 9.25 + CHF 4.00 for each addition item 
EMS CHF 21.75 + CHF 3.00 for each addition item 
* Air Mail is not available for country listed above. 

Zone 3: 

Indonesia, Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, United Arab Emirates, Georgia, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Syria, Turkey, Mongolia

Registered mail CHF 14.25 + CHF 3.00 for each addition item 
EMS CHF 21.75 + CHF 3.00 for each addition item 

* Air Mail or other services are not offered for countries listed above due to the high risk associated with sending mail to these countries (based on many years of our experience). Registered mail will only be offered for lower valued item. 

Zone 4: 

Puerto Rico, Trinidad and Tobago, Virgin Islands (USA), Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Uruguay and Venezuela, South Africa 

EMS : CHF 26.75 + CHF 3.00 for each addition item 
 *Air Mail and Registered Mail are not available for Zone 4. 

** Double CD, CD+DVD, CD sets...etc would be calculated differently. Any extra disc is CHF2.00. 


Italy: 

EMS:  
CDs/DVDs:  21.75 CHF (FREE shipping for each extra CD/DVD item:  so no matter if you buy 1 CD, or 20 CDs, your shipping cost is just 21.75 CHF).
Vinyl:  29.75 CHF (FREE shipping for any extra vinyl item)


SHIPPING for LASERDISCS, VHS Cassettes, etc:

LaserDiscs will ship at the same rates as Vinyl/LPs.
VHS Cassettes will ship at the same rate as DVDs.

- When you log into your Discogs account, you will see exact shipping cost. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us. :) 

HOW FAST DO WE SHIP?

While we make all efforts to dispatch orders within 1-3 business days (with rare exceptions on holidays or in circumstances beyond our control).  Please remain patient in such cases, and trust in the quality service record we have established online over the years. 

If you purchased shipping service with tracking (Registered Air Mail, or EMS), our team will send you the tracking number as soon as it becomes available to us (generally within a few days of your package having been shipped).  


_______________________________________________________________________________




PLEASE NOTE: 

We reserve the right to cancel orders at our discretion from buyers who do not meet the above mentioned provisions or those who we feel may wish to circumvent them.   Our policies are intended to encourage a safe, fair, and fun trading environment for the wonderful Discogs community. 

Duties/Import Taxes, if/when applied to a package are the sole responsibility of you, the importer (buyer).  Every country has different regulations in this regard.   We respectfully ask you not to request a different value to be declared on your package. Such requests violate our policies, the policies of Discogs, and more than likely, local laws.  We reserve the right to cancel orders, at our discretion, made by customers insisting on violating any of our policies, the policies of Discogs, or any applicable laws.   

Thank you.
Mayumi, PJ, Haruka, Kenji, and the rest of us at Kupiku.com
seller.payment: Credit Card, Bank Transfer, Check, PayPal, Cash, Money Order
